title: Peace Promotion Education Through Architecture-Based Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Architectural Concepts and Understanding of Social Conflict Resolution Methods
context.additional_context: Small-group activities for solving real community problems, combined with online discussions.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more conflict factors in the local community using participatory action research (PAR) methodology.
Apply Experiential Learning (EL) techniques to design a prototype for a space that promotes peace
Demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills with over 80% participation during team-based projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
